articles.content:
by Melinda Wenner MoyerAs the world waits for a coronavirus vaccine, tens of thousands of people could die. But some scientists believe a vaccine might already exist.

articles.title: First coronavirus case in France appeared in December: expert - ecns
articles.description: The novel coronavirus first appeared in France on December 27, 2019, said Yves Cohen, an intensive care chief of a hospital in Paris, in an interview with local media on Sunday.
articles.content:
Staff members of a private cleaning and disinfection company disinfect metro trains in Vincennes near Paris, France, April 30, 2020. (Photo/Xinhua)

articles.author: By Vanessa Chalmers Health Reporter For Mailonline
articles.title: One in four coronavirus patients on ventilation suffer KIDNEY failure - Daily Mail
articles.description: Charities in the UK have warned the killer infection can lead to acute kidney injury (AKI), a sudden serious condition that can be fatal if not treated immediately.
articles.content:
Over a quarter of coronavirus patients on ventilation suffer kidney failure, causing a shortage of vital equipment.

articles.author: Matt Atherton
articles.title: Coronavirus warning - the four emergency signs of deadly COVID-19 revealed - Express
articles.description: CORONAVIRUS is a deadly infection that's easily spread, and the disease has killed more than 28,000 people in the UK. There are four key emergency warning signs of COVID-19 that required immediate medical attention. Are you at risk of coronavirus symptoms?
